Line 87: Line 87:
===Film & TV===
===Film & TV===
In the Bonus Features of the ''[[Blade (film)|Blade]]'' DVD, an alternate ending can be seen where Blade, after dispatching [[Deacon Frost]], walks out onto the rooftop of a building only to glimpse a figure whose identity is concealed behind a cloth mask. The film's writer [[David S. Goyer]] has stated that he originally intended Morbius to be the primary villain should there be a sequel to Blade. This was eventually scrapped in favor of the Reaper storyline in the actual ''[[Blade II]]'' film.

The film's writer [[David S. Goyer]] has stated that he originally intended Morbius to be the primary villain should there be a sequel to Blade. This was eventually scrapped in favor of the Reaper storyline in the actual ''[[Blade II]]'' film.
